#Coefficients for FMR or MZR to use in constructing the metallicity distribution model
#Format: log(O/H) + 12 = c[0] + c[1]*m + c[2]*m^2 + c[3]*m^3 + c[4]*m^4 + c[5]*s + c[6]*s^2 + c[7]*m*s
#where m=log(stellar mass) - 10 and s=log(SFR)
